original_text: The shepherds then went back to their sheep. As they went they praised God. ‘How great you are!’ they said to him. ‘How good you are! Everything that the angel told us was true! We have heard good news. We have seen very special things!’
korean_text: 목자들은 자기들에게 이르던 바와 같이 듣고 본 그 모든 것으로 인하여 하나님께 영광을 돌리고 찬송하며 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: The shepherds then went back to their sheep.
As they went they praised God.
'How great you are!' they said to him.
Everything that the angel told us was true!
sentences.korean_translation: 천사가 우리에게 말한 모든 것이 참이었습니다!

sentences.original_text: We have seen very special things!'
